content: They are all standing together at a movie theater, where they initially planned to go see a movie. Matt and Mark are best friends, and they had made plans to see a movie together. However, Mark called Matt to cancel, saying he was sick, but later showed up at the movie theater with a different friend. This led to a tense and awkward situation when Matt unexpectedly ran into Mark and the other friend at the theater, and Joe, another friend of the group, joined them.
